fields.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
If True is entered, the Alternative Pay Range will be removed from the Compensation Grade or Grade Profile.

The minimum of the salary range.

The spread from the range minimum to range maximum.
Include Inactive indicates the response will also include inactive Compensation Plans and Guideline components.

CompensationGrade_Compensation_Grade_Ref.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Delete.description: If True is entered, the Alternative Pay Range will be removed from the Compensation Grade or Grade Profile.

Include_Inactive_Prompt.description: Include Inactive indicates the response will also include inactive Compensation Plans and Guideline components.

Spread.description: The spread from the range minimum to range maximum.
